content: Memo to UCSF provider network: Effective immediately, authorize genetic counseling code 96040 for all prion disease cases. Required documentation includes occupational history form PRION-OCC-v3 and baseline neuropsych testing. Exception process available for patients enrolled in the Moffitt Therapeutic Study through referral code MB2023. Contact Dr. Voss' team at (415) 555-6321 x809 for urgent consult coordination.
